import React from 'react'; import DefaultImage from '../../assets/images/car-image.webp'; const Card = ({ data }) => { return (
{/* card image */}
{/* feature */}
Featured
7
{/* card content */}
Crossover

{data.title}

{data.mileage}
{data.drive_type}
{data.fuel_type}

{data.price}

{data.after_price}
{data.dealer || `Unknown`}
View car
) } export default Card
